actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-759.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to establish the Rosie the Riveter-World War II Home Front National Historical Park in the State of California, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rosie the Riveter-World War II Home Front National Historical Park Act

summary.text: Rosie the Riveter-World War II Home Front National Historical Park Act - Establishes the Rosie the Riveter-World War II Home Front National Historical Park in California.

titles.title: Rosie the Riveter-World War II Home Front National Historical Park Act
A bill to establish the Rosie the Riveter-World War II Home Front National Historical Park in the State of California, and for other purposes.
